"Koffie": "<%me>, good work. This is the administrator, Koffie."
"On planet Amduscia, a new area beyond the Skyscape, the Dragon Altar, is now available to you."
"Because of your abilities, you have already been granted access. No permit quest is required."
"You can head down and investigate when you choose to."
"I look forward to continuing to work with you."
